title: Plate V from "Nella Venuta in Roma di Madama LeComte e dei Signori Watelet e Copette"
marks:
Inscription

URC, in the plate: [16.]; below ima
description: woman wearing long dress and man wearing long coat, knickers and powdered wig, accompanied by bare-legged figure with shield and torch, wearing a helmet, and other figures; figures approach a sculpture of a male nude holding a baton; a putti drapes the sculpture with a floral garland
creditline: Gift of funds from the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council
